previousMessages.content: tell me about my posts counts and  most engagaing in it

You have posted four times recently. The posts are:

* Post 1: "Let yourself occasionally get a little screwed in exchange for not having to live with your guard up all the time. Itâ€™s worth it."

The data provides an "Analysis based on 8 relevant data points from the sama account," but it does not specify the engagement metrics (likes, comments, etc.) for each individual post. Therefore, I cannot determine which post was the most engaging based on the information provided.
